[Sleep That Restores You] Regular use of our night mouth guards for teeth grinding enhance skin complexion, reduce the appearance of wrinkles, promote healthier-looking hair, making this teeth grinding guard a simple way to wake up feeling refreshed.

The Doctor’s mouth guard is crafted with a slim and flexible design that helps you sleep comfortably; patented slanted front provides more comfort by keeping material away from lips and gums

product_description: The Doctor’s NightGuard mouth guard for grinding teeth and clenching teeth is a powerful dental tool created by dentists to protect your smile while you sleep. That’s why it’s the number one dentist recommended over-the-counter dental guard.* Grinding teeth or clenching your jaw while sleeping can cause a multitude of muscular and dental issues and contribute to poor sleep. The Doctor’s mouth guard for grinding teeth at night is designed to absorb the force of grinding with two layers of cushion. This night guard is BPA-free and is crafted with a slim and flexible design that helps you sleep comfortably. The patented slanted front provides more comfort by keeping material away from lips and gums, making it an effective and comfortable mouth guard for clenching teeth at night. The Doctor’s night guards for teeth grinding and clenching are moldable for a custom fit; In less than 10 minutes and 3 easy steps, you can have a custom-fitted dental guard – because no smile is like yours. *ProVoice Survey, from 3/5/23-3/15/24

name: 4 Pack Night Guards for Teeth Grinding,Sleeping Mouth Guard,Mouth Guard for Grinding Teeth at Night,Bite Guard for Teeth clenching Nighttime,Dental Guards for Grinding Teeth,mouthguard for Adults
short_description: Safe and User-Friendly Design: anti-teeth grinding mouthguards is made of food-grade EVA material to ensure safety and harmlessness to the human body and can be used for a long time.

​​Dental Protection and improving Sleep Quality : These mouthguards feature excellent flexibility and elasticity, providing a comfortable fit. They cushion the biting forces and wear between teeth, effectively preventing teeth grinding and clenching during sleep while staying securely in place throughout the night. Upon waking, there will be no discomfort or soreness.

Convenient Usage and Rapid Customization: Simply soften the product in water at a specified temperature range (158-176F) for 15 seconds, then shape it by biting down. You can easily get a mouthguard that fits the shape of your teeth. (Refer to the user manual for detailed instructions)

Portable and Easy to Maintain: Our anti-grinding mouth guards come with individual storage boxes for consistent upkeep. After each use, rinse with clean water or gently brush with toothpaste and a soft-bristled toothbrush. Once cleaned, dry thoroughly and store in the provided box

Available in 2 sizes: Available in large and small sets to meet the needs of most people. You can also trim it according to your needs after shaping the mouth guard. 4 packs including 2 sizes(1.8in*2.2in+1.6in*2.4in)
product_description: ​​Protect Teeth, Improve Sleep​​ Our custom-fit mouth guard conforms snugly to teeth, offering a soft and comfortable feel. It helps prevent teeth grinding and regulates breathing, so you and your family can enjoy a restful night's sleep.
